Name: Demon city
About the game: Hello everyone, this is a small RPG game, round fighting game The combat mode adopts turn mode, so that you can not only experience the strike feeling of real-time combat, but also enjoy the skill combination strategy of turn mode. This version of the game has completed the first phase of the content, about 20 minutes in length, the full version is about 2 hours, the follow-up should be issued in the form of DLC. This is my first game, because the production is very immature, resulting in a lot of problems. Now the development has been suspended, but it will be completed later. The Devil Castle is the place where the devil lives. It is a Fantasy Legend lost for thousands of years. The protagonist inexplicably appears outside the demon castle, but there is no way out, and what is the front waiting for him? In the face of a variety of enemies, difficulties, with scarce resources to start thinking about solutions to it! Features of the game: 1. The repetition of enemy and event is low, and there are novel (items / treasure boxes) waiting to be explored in every corner of the map; 2. The setting of background and characters is rigorous and meticulous, expecting to show the story as if it were true; 3. In the face of difficulties, there are many solutions, which need to weigh the pros and cons, and carefully think about the steps forward.
